Method.name: CQPExecute
Method.Description: Query执行 1. 分页功能 pStart, pPageCount 需要传入 当前页 和每页多少行 2. 排序功能(传入排序的列) 列名:Desc,列名:Asc 3. 日期格式转换问题
Method.Implementation:
n rs, myrtn s $ZT="Error"
s rs="" s myrtn="" i ((classname="")||(classquery="")){ q myrtn }
s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidClassName(classname) q:('myIsVal) myrtn s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidQueryName(classname,classquery) q:('myIsVal) myrtn
s rs=##class(%Library.ResultSet).%New(classname_":"_classquery) s paramcnt=rs.GetParamCount() n x,ival s x="s execstatus=$$InvokeMethod^%apiOBJ(""%ResultSet"",rs,""Execute""" f j=1:1:paramcnt { s paramname=rs.GetParamName(j) s val=$g(%request.Data(("P"_j),1)) i $l(val,"""")>1 s val="" f ival=1:1:$l($g(%request.Data(paramname,1)),"""") s $p(val,"""""",ival)=$p(%request.Data(paramname,1),"""",ival) ;i val'="",val'?1n.n i ##class(%Library.Collation).Upper(paramname)["DATE" s val=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(val) ;i val'="",val'?1n.n i ##class(%Library.Collation).Upper(paramname)["TIME" s val=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeHtmlToLogical(val) s x=x_","""_val_"""" } s x=x_")" x x s ^TMPExtRequest("QueryBroker.CQPExecute")=x s myjsonstr="" ; ;判断返回是否ResultSet s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidResultSet(rs) i myIsVal{ if ($g(%request.Data("GetTotal",1))=1){ w ..GetTotal(rs) }else{ d ..GetRSJsonData(rs) } d rs.%Close() } q myjsonstr Error ;s ErrorMsg=$ZE ;s ^TempLookUpError($i(^TempLookUpError),classname,classquery)=ErrorMsg q "100"_"^"_$ZE

Method.name: CQExecute
Method.Implementation:
n rs, myrtn, mypageflag,mypagecount
;默认分页 s mypageflag=1 s mypagecount=20 s rs="" s myrtn="" i ((classname="")||(classquery="")){ q myrtn } s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidClassName(classname) q:('myIsVal) myrtn s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidQueryName(classname,classquery) q:('myIsVal) myrtn
s rs=##class(%Library.ResultSet).%New(classname_":"_classquery) s paramcnt=rs.GetParamCount() n x,ival s x="s execstatus=$$InvokeMethod^%apiOBJ(""%ResultSet"",rs,""Execute""" f j=1:1:paramcnt { s paramname=rs.GetParamName(j) s val=$g(%request.Data(paramname,1)) i $l(val,"""")>1 s val="" f ival=1:1:$l($g(%request.Data(paramname,1)),"""") s $p(val,"""""",ival)=$p(%request.Data(paramname,1),"""",ival) ;i val'="",val'?1n.n i ##class(%Library.Collation).Upper(paramname)["DATE" s val=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(val) ;i val'="",val'?1n.n i ##class(%Library.Collation).Upper(paramname)["TIME" s val=##class(websys.Conversions).TimeHtmlToLogical(val) s x=x_","""_val_"""" } s x=x_")" x x s ^TMPExtRequest("QueryBroker.CQExecute")=x s myjsonstr="" ; ;判断返回是否ResultSet s myIsVal=##class(websys.Conversions).IsValidResultSet(rs) i myIsVal{ d ..GetRSJsonData(rs) d rs.%Close() }
q myjsonstr

Method.name: GetRSJsonData
Method.Implementation:
;s mygridobj=##class(ext.entity.GridData).%New() s cnt=0 s displayRows=0 s rowData="" w "{record:[",! s columns=rs.GetColumnCount() s start = +$g(%request.Data("start",1)) s limit = +$g(%request.Data("limit",1)) ; ;ext默认的开始是0 s startRecordNo=start+1 s limitRecordCnt=limit
f q:rs.Next()=0 d .s cnt=cnt+1 .i ((cnt'<startRecordNo)&&(displayRows<limitRecordCnt))!(startRecordNo="")!(limitRecordCnt=0) d ..w:displayRows>0 "," ..w "{" ..s rowData="" ..f i=1:1:columns d ...s:i>1 rowData=rowData_"," ...s myColName=rs.GetColumnName(i) ...s:($ZCVT(myColName,"U")=..#LookupHidden) myColName=..#LookupHidden_i ...s rowData=rowData_"'"_myColName_"':" ;;rs.GetColumnName(i) ...s tmpData=rs.GetData(i) ...s tmpData=##class(ext.util.String).EvalJSON(tmpData) ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,"'","\'") ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,$c(13),"\n") ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,$c(10),"\r") ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,$c(2),"<$C2>") ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,$c(5),"<$C5>") ...;s tmpData=##class(web.DHCMedBaseCtl).ReplaceString(tmpData,$c(7),"<$C7>") ...s rowData=rowData_"'"_tmpData_"'" ..w rowData ..w "}",! ..s displayRows=displayRows+1
w "],total : "_cnt_"}"
;d mygridobj.%Close()

Method.name: ReadRS
Method.Description: 自动获取一个RS的输出列表 返回Json格式
Method.Implementation:
;w ##class(ext.websys.QueryBroker).ReadRS("web.DHCPE.PreGADM","SearchPreGADMShort") ;w ##class(ext.websys.QueryBroker).ReadRS("web.DHCSTDISPSTAT2","GroupLoc") ;w ##class(ext.websys.QueryBroker).ReadRS("web.SSLanguage","LookUp") n (classname,classquery)
s myjosnstr="" s myOutStr=##class(DHCCPMWeb.CPMBL.DHCBLCommFunLib).GetQOutParaList(classname,classquery,"")
s mycms=##class(ext.entity.GridModal).%New() s myColLen=$l(myOutStr, ",") s:(myOutStr="") myColLen="" f myIdx=1:1:myColLen { s myColStr=$p(myOutStr,",",myIdx) s myColumnName=$TR($p(myColStr,":",1)," ","") s myColumnType=$p(myColStr,":",2) s myColumnCaption=$p(myColStr,":",3)
s mycm=##class(ext.entity.ColumnModel).%New() if (($zconvert(myColumnName,"U"))'=..#LookupHidden){ ;s mycm.header=$s(myColumnCaption'="":myColumnCaption,1: myColumnName) ;wanghc 2012-10-31 国际化 s mycm.header=$s(myColumnCaption'="":"$g('"_myColumnCaption_"')",1: "$g('"_myColumnName_"')") ;"$g('"_myColumnName_"')" ; s mycm.dataIndex=myColumnName ;s mycm.width=100 }else{ s mycm.header=..#LookupHidden_myIdx ;$s(myColumnCaption'="":myColumnCaption,1: myColumnName) s mycm.dataIndex=..#LookupHidden_myIdx s mycm.hidden="true" } d mycms.cms.Insert(mycm)
s myfn=##class(ext.entity.Field).%New() s myfn.name=mycm.dataIndex ;;myColumnName d mycms.fns.Insert(myfn) }
s myjosnstr=mycms.GetJosnData()
q myjosnstr

Method.name: ReadRSNew
Method.Implementation:
q:(classname="")||(classquery="") "" n (%session,classname,classquery) ;s LookupListComponetId = $o(^websys.ComponentI("UniqueNameIndex","WEBSYSLOOKUPLIST",0)) s context="K"_classname_":"_classquery s myjosnstr=""
s myOutStr=##class(DHCCPMWeb.CPMBL.DHCBLCommFunLib).GetQOutParaList(classname,classquery,"") s mycms=##class(ext.entity.GridModal).%New() s myColLen=$l(myOutStr, ",") s uSet="" if (($g(%session)'="")&&($g(%session.Data("LOGON.USERID"))'="")) d .;s uSet=##class(websys.Preferences).GetDataExLE(1,1,"","",context,"COLUMNS","websys.LookUp.List",.app,.appid,.activecontext,"","") .s uSet=##Class(websys.Preferences).GetDataExLE($g(%session.Data("LOGON.USERID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.HOSPID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.SITECODE")),context,"COLUMNS","websys.LookUp.List",.app,.appid,.activecontext,$g(%session.Data("LOGON.TRUSTID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.REGION"))) .;不能改顺序,影响前台取值 .f idx=1:1:$l(uSet,"|") d ..s uSetItem = $p(uSet,"|",idx) ..s myIdx = $p(uSetItem,",",1) ;col-index,width,sort| ..s:myIdx>0 hiddenPlist(myIdx)=1,hiddenPlist(myIdx,2)=$p(uSetItem,",",2),hiddenPlist(myIdx,3)=$p(uSetItem,",",3) .s rowsSet=##Class(websys.Preferences).GetDataExLE($g(%session.Data("LOGON.USERID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.GROUPID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.HOSPID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.SITECODE")),context,"ROWS","websys.LookUp.List",.app,.appid,.activecontext,$g(%session.Data("LOGON.TRUSTID")),$g(%session.Data("LOGON.REGION"))) .s pageSize=$lg(rowsSet,1) f myIdx=1:1:myColLen { s myColStr=$p(myOutStr,",",myIdx) s myColumnName=$TR($p(myColStr,":",1)," ","") s myColumnType=$p(myColStr,":",2) s myColumnCaption=$p(myColStr,":",3) s myColumnWidth = $p(myColumnCaption,"^",2) s myColumnCaption = $p(myColumnCaption,"^",1) s mycm=##class(ext.entity.ColumnModel).%New() if ($zcvt(myColumnName,"U")=..#LookupHidden){ s mycm.header=..#LookupHidden_myIdx ;$s(myColumnCaption'="":myColumnCaption,1: myColumnName) s mycm.dataIndex=..#LookupHidden_myIdx s mycm.hidden="true" }else{ ;s mycm.header=$s(myColumnCaption'="":myColumnCaption,1: myColumnName) ;wanghc 2012-10-31 国际化 s mycm.header=$s(myColumnCaption'="":"$g('"_myColumnCaption_"')",1: "$g('"_myColumnName_"')") ;"$g('"_myColumnName_"')" ; s mycm.dataIndex=myColumnName i (uSet'=""),$g(hiddenPlist(myIdx))="" s mycm.hidden="true" i +myColumnWidth>0 s mycm.width=+myColumnWidth i ($g(hiddenPlist(myIdx))=1),$g(hiddenPlist(myIdx,2))'="" s mycm.width=hiddenPlist(myIdx,2) } d mycms.cms.Insert(mycm) s myfn=##class(ext.entity.Field).%New() s myfn.name=mycm.dataIndex ;;myColumnName d mycms.fns.Insert(myfn) } s myjosnstr =mycms.GetJosnData() i $g(pageSize)'="" s myjosnstr = $e(mycms.GetJosnData(),1,$l(mycms.GetJosnData())-1)_",pageSize:"_pageSize_"}"
q myjosnstr

Method.name: ReadRSNew2
GetTotal
